attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the spirit of the government's passion for banning anything that people actually enjoy doing, it is requested that a total ban on everything good is introduced as soon as possible.  Examples of this are drinking alcohol, going on holiday, owning pets, smoking in private places, using the internet, watching tv, shopping, driving, breathing (excessively), sleeping, talking.  We could then have a country more like Cuba or Tibet and the rest of the world would take pity on us, send us money and fight for our rights to do all these things again.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
